response.overview: Lost is a mystery and science-fiction TV series that follows the survivors of a commercial airplane crash on a remote, seemingly deserted island. As they struggle to stay alive, they discover that the island holds strange secrets, including unexplained phenomena, hidden groups, and a powerful connection to their pasts. The story moves between life on the island and flashbacks that reveal the charactersâ€™ histories, showing how fate, choice, and redemption shape their lives.
response.title: Lost
